name: HA Sensor
description: Store the state of a Home Assistant entity in the scene's state

fields.markdown:
Find the [entity id here](http://homeassistant.local:8123/config/entities). Then use code like:

scene.state{"water_heater"}{"state"}.getStr

fields.name: entityId
fields.label: Entity ID
fields.placeholder: Home Assistant entity name. Example: sensor.home_solar_percentage or water_heater.hot_water

fields.name: stateKey
fields.label: State key to store the json in
